mapper.select: SELECT m.mem_id, m.mem_name, m.mem_email, m.mem_private_email, m.mem_phone, ct1.comm_name AS dept_name, ct2.comm_name AS rank_name, m.mem_status, m.mem_hiredate, m.mem_gender, CONCAT(m.jumin_front, '-', LEFT(m.jumin_back, 1), '******') AS birth_date, m.mem_address, CONCAT(a.file_path, '/', a.saved_name) AS mem_picture FROM member m LEFT JOIN common_type ct1 ON m.dept_id = ct1.comm_code AND ct1.code_group = 'dept' LEFT JOIN common_type ct2 ON m.rank_id = ct2.comm_code AND ct2.code_group = 'rank' LEFT JOIN attachment a ON a.business_id = m.mem_id AND a.attach_type = 'P' WHERE m.mem_id = #{memId}
